function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne virus spread in public transport","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission and spread among public transport users","Mitigation":"Installing HEPA filters and implementing surface disinfection","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV disinfection","People":"Public transport users","Owner":"Transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Large-scale urban transportation changes","Impact":"Potential virus transmission and spread from new transportation systems","Mitigation":"Implementing UV disinfection on new transportation systems and promoting personal protective measures","Technologies":"UV disinfection, personal protective measures","People":"General public","Owner":"Urban planners, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Mobility sharing with bicycles and electric car sharing","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in shared mobility systems","Mitigation":"Implementing UV disinfection on shared bicycles and electric cars, promoting personal protective measures","Technologies":"UV disinfection, personal protective measures","People":"Users of shared mobility systems","Owner":"Bike sharing companies, electric car sharing companies"}]}
